intro: This Product User Manual provides a comprehensive overview of the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) N2K product, which offers detailed Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) data for grassland-rich Natura 2000 sites across Europe. Covering the years 2006, 2012, and 2018, the N2K product facilitates the monitoring and assessment of habitat conservation status through high-resolution satellite imagery. This manual details the product's characteristics, methodology, potential applications, quality assessment procedures, and provides guidance on accessing and utilising the data effectively for environmental monitoring and policy support.
